io.leonis.algieba.statistic.distribution

Class GaussianDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.leonis.algieba.statistic.distribution.GaussianDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Distribution

    public class GaussianDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
implements Distribution
    The Class GaussianDistribution. This class represents the statistics of a state-space which is characterized by a mean and covariance such that the distribution is of the Gaussian form. This distribution is often called the normal distribution.

    • Method Detail

      • erf

        public static double erf(double value)
        Calculates the value of the Gaussian error function. See here for implementation details. The value of this function may cancel when extremely close to 0.
        Parameters:
        value - The value for which the Gaussian error function needs to be calculated.
        Returns:
        The value of the Gaussian error function for the supplied parameter.

        public static Distribution from(java.util.Collection<org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray> samples)
        Parameters:
        samples - The samples to compute a Gaussian distribution from.
        Returns:
        The Gaussian distribution representing the supplied samples.
